posts.post_title: T3 Turkey Red - Joe Tinker PSA-4     For Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Craig D
Deep rich colors, excellent focus and original sheen on the front.  Clean back.  A first series Hall of Famer that you really don't see that often.  I'm asking $1250 OBO.  Please respond here or email me at mackeyd@mailcity.com.   

I have several other T3s available as well.   www.t3turkeyred.com

Thanks very much!
